item.title: Linux
item.description: 9001 times better than Windows. Misc Random reference I saved for some reason, IDK I don’t use VIM: http://vimregex.com/ Fix perl locale message update-locale LC_CTYPE=en_US.UTF-8 Show current shell ps -p $$ Removing a Git submodule git submodule deinit <path_to_submodule> git rm <path_to_submodule> git commit-m "Removed submodule " rm -rf .

item.title: Cyber Operations
item.description: You got the pen-testing agreement in writing I hope.
